item.title: Principal Investigator
item.description: Yaping Liu (刘亚平) is an Assistant Professor (tenure-track) in Division of Human Genetics, Department of Pediatric at CCHMC and School of Medicine at University of Cincinnati (2019-). Prior to joining CCHMC and UC faculty, he was the principal computational biologist at Freenome Inc in 2018. In 2014-2017, he was a postdoc associate with Dr. Manolis Kellis in the Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory MIT and Broad institute. In 2014, He received his Ph.

item.title: Member 3
item.description: Postdoctoral research associate at Broad institute (2015-2017). Ph.D. from UGA (2015)

item.title: Postdoc
item.description: Faculty at Huazhong Agricultural University (2014-2018). Ph.D. from Wuhan University (2014)
